channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: The best projectors of CES 2026: brighter portables, big-screen gaming, and a Dolby Atmos home theater on wheels
item.description: CES has become a reliable venue for new projectors, and these were the six most promising models I saw on the show floor.

item.title: CES 2026 had a surprising phone presence — here are 5 of my top picks
item.description: Looks like smartphones are back on the menu at CES 2026: from the Galaxy TriFold to a BlackBerry-style throwback.
